div.p: REPTILES , in natural hiſtory, a kind of animals denominated from their creeping or advancing on the belly. Indeed, moſt of the claſs of reptiles have feet ; only thoſe very ſmall, and the legs remarkably ſhort in , proportion to the bulk of the body.
